alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kern River Valley; Kings Canyon NP; Piute Walker Basin; Sequoia NP; South End San Joaquin Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:41AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Kern, Tulare and east central Fresno Counties through 830 AM PST... At 739 AM PST, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 27 miles southeast of Oakhurst to 7 miles west of Wasco. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Public and law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield, Visalia, Tulare, Porterville, Delano, Wasco, Shafter, Orosi, Earlimart, McFarland, Lindsay, Farmersville, Exeter, Woodlake, Terra Bella, East Orosi, East Porterville, Strathmore, Ivanhoe and Cutler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
